net.sourceforge.jasa.agent
Interface TradingAgent

All Superinterfaces:
net.sourceforge.jabm.Agent, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, MarketEventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTradingAgent, FixedDirectionTradingAgent, SimpleTradingAgent, TokenTradingAgent
public interface TradingAgent
extends net.sourceforge.jabm.Agent, MarketEventListener

Classes implementing this interface can trade in round-robin auctions, as implemented by the RoundRobinAuction class.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Steve Phelps
